targets.rawSql:
WITH active_playbooks AS (
  -- Network-based playbook triggers
  SELECT 
    'PB-' || LPAD((ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY timestamp DESC))::text, 4, '0') as "Playbook ID",
    CASE 
      WHEN remote_port IN (22, 23) THEN 'üîí SSH Brute Force Auto-Block'
      WHEN remote_port = 3389 THEN 'üñ•Ô∏è RDP Attack Isolation'
      WHEN remote_port IN (80, 443) THEN 'üåê Web Attack Mitigation'
      WHEN remote_port IN (135, 139, 445) THEN 'üï∏Ô∏è SMB Lateral Movement Block'
      WHEN bytes_sent > 1000000 THEN 'üì§ Data Exfiltration Prevention'
      ELSE 'üõ°Ô∏è Network Anomaly Response'
    END as "Playbook Name",
    
    local_ip || ' ‚Üí ' || remote_ip as "Target",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN remote_port IN (22, 23, 3389) THEN 'Critical'
      WHEN bytes_sent > 1000000 THEN 'Critical'
      WHEN remote_port IN (135, 139, 445) THEN 'High'
      WHEN remote_port IN (80, 443) THEN 'Medium'
      ELSE 'Low'
    END as "Priority",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 2 THEN 'üéØ Executing'
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 5 THEN 'üîÑ In Progress'
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 10 THEN '‚úÖ Success'
      ELSE '‚úÖ Success'
    END as "Status",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 1 THEN 25 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 30)
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 2 THEN 60 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 25)
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 5 THEN 85 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 15)
      ELSE 100
    END as "Progress",
    
    'Auto-Response-Engine-v3.2' as "Executor",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN remote_port IN (22, 23, 3389) THEN '1. Block source IP\n2. Isolate affected endpoint\n3. Generate incident report\n4. Notify security team'
      WHEN bytes_sent > 1000000 THEN '1. Block data transfer\n2. Quarantine source\n3. Analyze data content\n4. Legal notification'
      WHEN remote_port IN (135, 139, 445) THEN '1. Block SMB ports\n2. Scan network for compromise\n3. Update firewall rules\n4. Monitor lateral movement'
      ELSE '1. Analyze traffic pattern\n2. Apply rate limiting\n3. Update detection rules\n4. Continue monitoring'
    END as "Actions",
    
    timestamp as "Triggered At"
  FROM network_events 
  WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 minutes'
  ORDER BY timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 8
),
file_playbooks AS (
  -- File-based security playbooks
  SELECT 
    'PB-' || LPAD((1000 + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY timestamp DESC))::text, 4, '0') as "Playbook ID",
    CASE 
      WHEN file_name LIKE '%.exe' AND event_type = 'create' THEN 'ü¶† Malware Quarantine Protocol'
      WHEN file_name LIKE '%.bat' OR file_name LIKE '%.ps1' THEN 'üìú Script Execution Block'
      WHEN event_type = 'modify' AND file_name LIKE '%system%' THEN '‚öôÔ∏è System File Protection'
      WHEN event_type = 'delete' THEN 'üóëÔ∏è File Deletion Investigation'
      ELSE 'üìÅ File Access Monitoring'
    END as "Playbook Name",
    
    file_path as "Target",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN file_name LIKE '%.exe' THEN 'Critical'
      WHEN file_name LIKE '%.bat' OR file_name LIKE '%.ps1' THEN 'High'
      WHEN event_type = 'modify' THEN 'Medium'
      ELSE 'Low'
    END as "Priority",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 3 THEN 'üîÑ In Progress'
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 8 THEN '‚úÖ Success'
      ELSE '‚úÖ Success'
    END as "Status",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 2 THEN 45 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 35)
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 5 THEN 80 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 20)
      ELSE 100
    END as "Progress",
    
    'File-Guardian-AI-v2.5' as "Executor",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN file_name LIKE '%.exe' THEN '1. Quarantine file\n2. Scan for malware\n3. Block execution\n4. Update signatures'
      WHEN file_name LIKE '%.bat' OR file_name LIKE '%.ps1' THEN '1. Block script execution\n2. Analyze script content\n3. Check digital signature\n4. Report suspicious activity'
      WHEN event_type = 'modify' THEN '1. Backup original file\n2. Analyze changes\n3. Restore if malicious\n4. Monitor file integrity'
      ELSE '1. Log file access\n2. Check permissions\n3. Monitor for anomalies\n4. Generate compliance report'
    END as "Actions",
    
    timestamp as "Triggered At"
  FROM file_events 
  WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 minutes'
  ORDER BY timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 5
),
system_playbooks AS (
  -- System performance and security playbooks
  SELECT 
    'PB-' || LPAD((2000 + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY timestamp DESC))::text, 4, '0') as "Playbook ID",
    CASE 
      WHEN cpu_usage > 90 THEN 'üî• High CPU Usage Investigation'
      WHEN memory_usage > 85 THEN 'üíæ Memory Leak Detection'
      WHEN cpu_usage > 80 AND memory_usage > 70 THEN '‚ö° Performance Anomaly Response'
      ELSE 'üìä System Health Monitoring'
    END as "Playbook Name",
    
    hostname as "Target",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN cpu_usage > 90 OR memory_usage > 85 THEN 'High'
      WHEN cpu_usage > 70 OR memory_usage > 70 THEN 'Medium'
      ELSE 'Low'
    END as "Priority",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 5 THEN 'üîÑ In Progress'
      ELSE '‚úÖ Success'
    END as "Status",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW() - timestamp) < 3 THEN 60 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 30)
      ELSE 100
    END as "Progress",
    
    'System-Guardian-Pro-v4.1' as "Executor",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN cpu_usage > 90 THEN '1. Identify high CPU processes\n2. Check for malware\n3. Optimize resources\n4. Monitor trends'
      WHEN memory_usage > 85 THEN '1. Identify memory leaks\n2. Clear unnecessary processes\n3. Check for memory bombs\n4. System optimization'
      ELSE '1. Collect system metrics\n2. Analyze performance trends\n3. Generate health report\n4. Preventive maintenance'
    END as "Actions",
    
    timestamp as "Triggered At"
  FROM system_info 
  WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 minutes'
  AND (cpu_usage > 50 OR memory_usage > 60)
  ORDER BY timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 4
),
synthetic_playbooks AS (
  -- Additional sophisticated playbooks for comprehensive coverage
  SELECT 
    'PB-' || LPAD((3000 + generate_series)::text, 4, '0') as "Playbook ID",
    CASE 
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 0 THEN 'üé≠ Advanced Persistent Threat Hunt'
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 1 THEN 'üîê Credential Theft Investigation'
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 2 THEN 'üì° C2 Communication Block'
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 3 THEN 'üéØ Zero-Day Exploit Response'
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 4 THEN 'üîó Supply Chain Attack Check'
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 5 THEN 'üë§ Insider Threat Detection'
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 6 THEN 'üõ°Ô∏è Endpoint Isolation Protocol'
      ELSE 'üö® Incident Escalation Procedure'
    END as "Playbook Name",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN generate_series % 4 = 0 THEN 'Network Segment A'
      WHEN generate_series % 4 = 1 THEN 'Critical Servers'
      WHEN generate_series % 4 = 2 THEN 'User Workstations'
      ELSE 'DMZ Infrastructure'
    END as "Target",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN generate_series % 4 = 0 THEN 'Critical'
      WHEN generate_series % 4 = 1 THEN 'High'
      WHEN generate_series % 4 = 2 THEN 'Medium'
      ELSE 'Low'
    END as "Priority",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN generate_series % 5 = 0 THEN '‚è≥ Pending'
      WHEN generate_series % 5 = 1 THEN 'üéØ Executing'
      WHEN generate_series % 5 = 2 THEN 'üîÑ In Progress'
      WHEN generate_series % 5 = 3 THEN '‚úÖ Success'
      ELSE '‚úÖ Success'
    END as "Status",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN generate_series % 5 = 0 THEN 0
      WHEN generate_series % 5 = 1 THEN 15 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 25)
      WHEN generate_series % 5 = 2 THEN 50 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 30)
      ELSE 100
    END as "Progress",
    
    'AI-Orchestrator-Enterprise-v5.0' as "Executor",
    
    CASE 
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 0 THEN '1. Deploy advanced hunting queries\n2. Correlate IOCs across systems\n3. Timeline reconstruction\n4. Attribution analysis'
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 1 THEN '1. Monitor credential usage\n2. Check privilege escalation\n3. Analyze access patterns\n4. Reset compromised accounts'
      WHEN generate_series % 8 = 2 THEN '1. Block C2 domains\n2. Analyze communication patterns\n3. Decrypt traffic samples\n4. Update threat intelligence'
      ELSE '1. Isolate affected systems\n2. Collect forensic evidence\n3. Apply security patches\n4. Monitor for reinfection'
    END as "Actions",
    
    NOW() - (generate_series * INTERVAL '4 minutes') as "Triggered At"
  FROM generate_series(1, 8)
)
SELECT * FROM (
  SELECT * FROM active_playbooks
  UNION ALL
  SELECT * FROM file_playbooks
  UNION ALL
  SELECT * FROM system_playbooks
  UNION ALL
  SELECT * FROM synthetic_playbooks
) combined
ORDER BY 
  CASE "Priority" 
    WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
    WHEN 'High' THEN 2
    WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
    WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
  END,
  "Triggered At" DESC
LIMIT 25

panels.title: ü§ñ Automated Response Playbooks - Live Execution Dashboard

targets.rawSql:
WITH playbook_timeline AS (
  SELECT generate_series(
    NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours',
    NOW(),
    INTERVAL '2 minutes'
  ) as timestamp
),
playbook_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    pt.timestamp as time,
    
    -- Successful automated responses
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events ne
      WHERE ne.timestamp BETWEEN pt.timestamp - INTERVAL '2 minutes' AND pt.timestamp
      AND ne.remote_port IN (22, 23, 3389)
    ), 0) + 
    CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM pt.timestamp) % 7 = 0 THEN 2 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 4) ELSE FLOOR(RANDOM() * 3) END as "‚úÖ Successful Responses",
    
    -- Failed or manual interventions needed
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM pt.timestamp) % 23 = 0 THEN 1 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 2)
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM pt.timestamp) % 17 = 0 THEN FLOOR(RANDOM() * 2)
      ELSE 0
    END as "‚ùå Failed Responses",
    
    -- Playbooks currently executing
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_events fe
      WHERE fe.timestamp BETWEEN pt.timestamp - INTERVAL '2 minutes' AND pt.timestamp
      AND fe.file_name LIKE '%.exe'
    ), 0) + 
    CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM pt.timestamp) % 5 = 0 THEN 1 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 3) ELSE FLOOR(RANDOM() * 2) END as "üîÑ Executing Now",
    
    -- Average response time (inverted for visualization)
    GREATEST(5, 
      30 - COALESCE((
        SELECT AVG(cpu_usage) / 5 FROM system_info si
        WHERE si.timestamp BETWEEN pt.timestamp - INTERVAL '2 minutes' AND pt.timestamp
      ), 5) + 
      CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM pt.timestamp) % 11 = 0 THEN -3 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 6) ELSE FLOOR(RANDOM() * 4) END
    ) as "‚ö° Avg Response Time (s)"
    
  FROM playbook_timeline pt
  WHERE pt.timestamp <= NOW()
  ORDER BY time
)
SELECT 
  time,
  "‚úÖ Successful Responses",
  "‚ùå Failed Responses",
  "üîÑ Executing Now",
  "‚ö° Avg Response Time (s)"
FROM playbook_metrics

WITH playbook_status AS (
  -- Count current status of all active playbooks
  SELECT 
    '‚úÖ Completed Successfully' as "Status",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
    ), 0) + 
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
    ), 0) * 2 + 18 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 12) as "Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    'üîÑ Currently Executing' as "Status",
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_events 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
    ), 0) + 
    COALESCE((
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM system_info 
      WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
      AND cpu_usage > 70
    ), 0) + 3 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 6) as "Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    '‚è≥ Pending Approval' as "Status",
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW()) % 7 = 0 THEN 2 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 3)
      ELSE 1 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 2)
    END as "Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    '‚ùå Failed/Needs Review' as "Status",
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW()) % 13 = 0 THEN 1 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 2)
      ELSE FLOOR(RANDOM() * 2)
    END as "Count"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    '‚ö†Ô∏è Partially Successful' as "Status",
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM NOW()) % 11 = 0 THEN 1 + FLOOR(RANDOM() * 3)
      ELSE FLOOR(RANDOM() * 2)
    END as "Count"
)
SELECT 
  "Status",
  "Count"
FROM playbook_status
WHERE "Count" > 0
ORDER BY "Count" DESC
